member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Chrome.ChromeDriver.StartClient
member.summary: By default will try to load Chrome from system property webdriver.chrome.bin and the extension from webdriver.chrome.extensiondir. If the former fails, will try to guess the path to Chrome. If the latter fails, will try to unzip from the JAR we hope we're in. If these fail, throws exceptions.
